front.title: QoS Signaling Framework for Mobile IP

abstract.t: This draft provides a framework for QoS signaling that is optimized for Mobile IP handoffs. It covers the horizontal signaling between access routers (ARs) as well as the vertical signaling along the packet data path, both of which are triggered by handoff of mobile node (MN). The key design goals are wireless bandwidth economy, fast QoS establishment along the new data path after handoff and secure protocol operation.
